collections.title: Australia Land Cover
collections.description:
Comprehensive land cover data for Australia.

Geographic extent: Australia
Year range: 2000-2008
Resolution: 9 arcsec (~250m)
Data layers: Dynamic Land Cover, Enhanced Vegetation Index (min, max, mean)

attributions.value: Lymburner L, Tan P, Mueller N, Thackway R, Lewis A, Thankappan M, Randall L, Islam A, Senarath U (2011) The National Dynamic Land Cover Dataset (v1.0), Geoscience Australia, Canberra.

subjects: Dynamic Land Cover, Enhanced Vegetation Index
